tool_description: Restful API for getting weather information, city and country name, weather type, current date and time.
name: Weather Request
title: Weather Request

api_list.name: Single Data
api_list.description: Using this endpoint u can get singular data, for example: if u type /weather/Serbia , the result would be a json data that gets information about city/cities in Serbia.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-request.p.rapidapi.com/weather/Serbia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-request.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-request.p.rapidapi.com/weather/{city_or_country_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-request.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Weather World Wide
api_list.description: Using /weather u can get all data about weather around the globe.
